p: Two types of hot chocolate powders were prepared (VHC1 and VHC2), using raw and auxiliary materials purchased from the Romanian market. Both product variants had a common base composition (CBC) obtained by mixing the materials and proportions specified in Table 1. In addition to the common basic composition, other powders obtained from dried vegetable materials were mixed in each type of product (as shown in Table 1), all these being finely ground beforehand with the help of an electric grinder (“Bosch” brand TSM6A013B model, Stuttgart, Germany).
